ears_fact: They twitch to voices that sound like an older sister.
family_fact: They prepare two birthday cakes every year.
profile: Admire Vega. ...Can I go now? I need to train more, win more races, and I need to become a first-magnitude star.
slogan: Burdened with resolve. A first magnitude star who stays alone.
tail_fact: She has a habit of unconsciously clutching it while sleeping.

ears_fact: Catching emo vibes makes her ears stand on edge.
family_fact: My family's hobbies include: Camping! Festivals! BBQ!
profile: Hewwo! I'm Digi-tan! I'm a massive fan of all of the sparkling Umamusume! I'm so happy every day! I'm so glad I was born an otaku!~♪
slogan: She loves Umamusume! A super all-around otaku.
strengths: Her massage techniques are in a league of their own
tail_fact: She goes to the hairdresser to get her hair done before a live.

ears_fact: She refuses to be touched on the ears or forehead.
family_fact: The unorthodox child of a family with a spectacular reputation in the racing world.
profile: Aren't you interested about how fast a Umamusume can go? If you are, I, Agnes Tachyon, would like you to be my guinea pig.
slogan: A Forbidden Mad Scientist. Physical research is everything!
tail_fact: When she gets an idea, her tail stands on end.

ears_fact: They droop gently when tending to flowers.
family_fact: She spends all year meticulously planning her mother's birthday party.
profile: I am Air Groove. If you don't bend your beliefs, your ideals will surely sprout. To demonstrate this, I, the Empress, will be the guiding light for everyone.
slogan: Level-headed "Empress",a talented and colorful career lady!
tail_fact: She uses the same tail oil as her mother.

ears_fact: They flop down when she relaxes.
family_fact: They all write in their own diaries.
profile: Air Messiah. I want to be strong and graceful, like my mother was. I will prove the greatness and value of the future.
slogan: Steadfast in achieving her mother's wish that she carries with her.
strengths: Clearing every single line off the chalkboard
tail_fact: She's got her tail hair from her mother's side.

ears_fact: They stand upright during logical thinking.
family_fact: She never opened the allowance money her mother sent her.
profile: I'm Air Shakur. In any case, data speaks louder than victory or defeat. I don't have a problem with simulation, I'll screw you over, logistically.
slogan: Let's be logical! An eccentric genius girl.
tail_fact: She calculates and maintains the appropriate length and hair volume for efficient running.

profile: I'm Almond Eye. I will win, even if my opponent's a legend. That's what I believe in!
slogan: Hates losing with a passion! The ultimate challenger.

ears_fact: Often loses earrings. This is her 9th set.
family_fact: When her mother fell asleep on the couch, she was in charge of carrying her to bed.
profile: I'm Machan. Aston Machan. I will eventually become the world's mascot. Keep looking straight at me with those eyes.
slogan: A mascot to aim for. Some transient and eccentric girl.
tail_fact: Looking for a style that will look good in merch

ears_fact: They droop down when her headband is taken off.
family_fact: Her father, a passionate gym teacher, is her mentor and origin point.
profile: Hey there! Bamboo Memory! I'm going to run hard to earn the name of "Demon Chairman of the Public Discipline Committee"!
slogan: Seeking serious competition! The hot-blooded chairman of the Public Morals Committee!
strengths: Early to bed, early to rise, quick decisions!
tail_fact: She disciplines her tail every day too.

ears_fact: Always listening for cries for help.
family_fact: Sunday mornings are Tokusatsu time with the whole family!
profile: The hero of justice, Biko Pegasus, is here! I can take down any formidable foe and make everyone smile! Isn't that great!
slogan: The flame of justice burns bright! A passionate Hero rises!
tail_fact: She accidentally steps on it when posing like a hero.
weaknesses: Eating too much without realizing it
weight: Slight increase (Growing girls eat a lot!)

ears_fact: As a child, she was sensitive to noises and was often startled by them.
family_fact: Her mother and her sister used to have matching hairstyles.
profile: I'm Biwa Hayahide. My goal is to assemble the perfect winning formula. ...Also, I have a normal-sized head!
slogan: Passionate intellect. Use logic as your weapon!
tail_fact: When it's damp, she has a hard time getting her tail into the tail hole of her clothes.

profile: It's me, Blast Onepiece! Humans are so friendly to me. I love them super duper much! I wanna get closer to them and get to know them even better!
slogan: A friendly Umamusume with a great fondness for humans.

ears_fact: She has the sharpest ears of the Big Four.
family_fact: They all have a refined sweet smell.
profile: I declare: "As shock troop commander, I will conceive the cyclone of the Big Four!" Let's expand our dream together!
slogan: A shock troop commander with a fighting spirit and an expanding dream!
strengths: Balloon modelling, singing western music a capella
tail_fact: She loves to decorate it with pastel colors.

profile: I'm Buena Vista! I want to fulfil my promise. To reach that beautiful scenery.
slogan: One day she will reach the scenery she longs for. An earnest Umamusume full of love.

ears_fact: Can hear cats meow from miles away.
family_fact: She can tell what her parents are thinking about from their facial expressions alone.
profile: Calstone Light O. My dream is to break all speed records. My favorite thing... Straight lines. That's it. Even my introduction goes by in a flash.
slogan: To the light, and beyond! A leader who presses on at top speed.
strengths: Cleaning floors, racing duels while dizzy
tail_fact: Cuts her hair perfectly straight using a ruler.

ears_fact: They need pampering lest they droop down.
family_fact: Her mother has a secret recipe for carrot glacé.
profile: I desire to solidify my future through coronation with the tiara. ――Oh, and nice to meet you!
slogan: A strict warrior and holy mother. An Umamusume with two sides.
tail_fact: She uses deep-sea water shampoo for it.
weight: Slight decrease (Holding back for an upcoming race)

ears_fact: When she's alone, she takes off her hat and exposes them to the wind.
family_fact: Family members take turns deciding the destinations of their overseas trips.
profile: I'm... Sheval Grand... I know I'm nothing... special... But one day... I'll achieve greatne— N-no, I'll try my hardest!
slogan: A shy Umamusume full of ambition. Aiming for greatness.
strengths: Fishing in the sea, baseball, spending time alone
tail_fact: Vivlos often braids it without permission.

slogan: 稀代のレース史好き。\n新時代の創生を！

ears_fact: Both of her ear covers were handmade by her dad.
family_fact: She has a lot of siblings, so her home is very lively ☆
profile: Rickey ☆ Lucky ☆ Auspicious ☆ Copano Rickey! The power of Feng Shui will bring you happiness too ♪
slogan: Rickey ☆ Lucky ☆ A helpful Feng shui girl ☆
tail_fact: It tends to flutter towards the luckiest direction of the day.

slogan: 願いと優しさを束ねて駆ける\n可憐なる華

ears_fact: When they move like beckoning hands, she wants to be pampered.
family_fact: They missed their daughter so much that they applied to be members of Tracen Academy's staff.
profile: I'm Curren, a.k.a. Curren Chan! I'm going to wrap the world in "cuteness"!☆ Don't look away, look at Curren ♪
slogan: A flash of adorable light! Love her lots ♪
tail_fact: Fluffy and silky to the touch, it'll make you fall in love with it.

ears_fact: Can stand straight and attentive when listening to music.
family_fact: A photograph of her mother and grandmother hangs in her room.
profile: My name is Daiichi Ruby. To be supreme is the duty of my family. I will strive to fulfill my duty.
slogan: Victory is a must. An umamusume from a brilliant family.
tail_fact: The hairtips naturally curl themselves into classy shapes.

ears_fact: They're hilariously active on sunny days.
family_fact: Playing dead always fools her parents lol
profile: Weee~iii! I'm Daitaku Helios~! I'm gonna run the most hype race ever, so please give me your best call! ☆
slogan: Live it up ☆ Party Everyday!
strengths: Mad good at Old Maid, crazy fashionable
tail_fact: Loves making heart shapes with her friends for photos.
weaknesses: Silence got her blue, formal speech's more like purple

ears_fact: They unconsciously reveal her true feelings.
family_fact: She misses her mother, who's always enthusiastic about her racing
profile: Hello, I'm Daiwa Scarlet! I'll do my best to... Hmph! I'm going to be number one. That's all!
slogan: Self-important! A girl with a competitive streak!
tail_fact: She struggles to brush it every morning.

profile: I'm Dantsu Flame. Hey, no fighting okay? I work hardest after eating something sweet, I guess?
slogan: A nice-natured Umamusume with a cute side. She's easily swayed by others.
洗練された自信\n煌めくはクイーンハート！
清廉なる大自然の申し子

ears_fact: Shall not be touched!
family_fact: Not a day goes by that she doesn't think about them.
profile: I, Dream Journey am there for you if you're looking to go on an expedition beyond your dreams. I can feel it in you.
slogan: One ought not to look into the eyes on a dream journey filled with happiness.
tail_fact: Shall not be touched!

ears_fact: Often stand up straight and motionless.
family_fact: Her family gets serious in table tennis matches at hot spring vacations.
profile: ...I'm Duramente. My goal is not to win, but to lead with great strength. ...That's all.
slogan: The strongest passion flows through her. She's the fruit of an esteemed family.
strengths: Testing her agility (esp. the Side-Step test)
tail_fact: She got it to the perfect weight for exercise.

ears_fact: They particularly pay attention to compliments.
family_fact: Who gets to do house chores is decided through games of "Acchi Muite Hoi".
profile: My holy sword shall release a blazing light, which shall free you from the darkness that devours you. My name is Durandal. I vow to be your loyal knight!
slogan: Pay heed! The devoted sacred sword with dazzling footwork.
strengths: Mowing grass, writing in-depth reviews of romance shows
tail_fact: She wonders if she couldn't use it as a weapon.

ears_fact: Listening to the sound of a metronome soothes her.
family_fact: They run a cake shop, and their specialty is baumkuchen.
profile: My name is Eishin Flash. In order to keep the tradition of Umamusume alive, I will continue to run. Every race and everything else is on schedule.
slogan: Everything is according to plan. The respectful and honest Mädchen.
tail_fact: She cuts it to the nearest tenth of a millimeter.

ears_fact: She goes on the defense when she hears the wrestling count.
family_fact: She grew up with a hawk named Mambo. He's like her sibling.
profile: I'm the crimson bird that runs the course! El Condor Pasa is closing in! I'm flying around the world!
slogan: Mystery North American bird! The cheerful and eccentric lucha libre
tail_fact: Grabbing her tail is an automatic foul.

profile: This here gal's Espoir City! Keep them races comin'! I'll leave 'em in the... dust...? Hey, hands off! I didn't ask ya to pat my head!
slogan: "Beat me if you can!" A rebellious girl who loves to bicker.

ears_fact: 威厳のある毛並みはひそかなお気に入り
slogan: 厳格なる正義――\n走る強面おまわりさん
strengths: 書道、感謝状を書くこと
tail_fact: ボスの前ではたいてい揺れている

ears_fact: They love hearing about new, popular culture.
family_fact: She's better at taking care of her uninhibited and open-minded sister than her parents are.
profile: Good day, I'm Fine Motion! I want to make lots of great memories. First things first, I want to know where the best noodle shops are. ♪
slogan: A free-spirited memory maker! She's a sheltered Royal Lady.
tail_fact: She has the unique hair texture of royalty. Commonly known as a "Royal Tail".

ears_fact: She has perfect pitch.
family_fact: She comes from a stage family; her parents travel all over the country.
profile: I'm the jet-black entertainer, Fuji Kiseki! I'll make you smile with my best "miracle"!
slogan: Leave the escorting to me! A gorgeous & gentle girl!
tail_fact: It sways gracefully, like a feather in an opera.

ears_fact: They become active when she hears the sound of the waves or the salty sea breeze.
family_fact: Their staple on birthdays is a tart with Asian pears.
profile: I'm Furioso. No, I don't come from Chuo. I made a special transfer from Funabashi and I'm not afraid to show you what we're made of.
slogan: A calm transfer student from the countryside, with unwavering love of Funabashi.
strengths: Giving tours of Funabashi (she made her own map)
tail_fact: When she finds herself moved by her feelings, she reprimands herself by slapping it against her legs.

ears_fact: She's really picky about matching her ear covers to her outfit.
family_fact: She's been taken up Mt. Fuji to the third station at 3 years old, the 5th station at 5 and to the top at 7.
profile: Logic and reason? Pure nonsense. Winning is the only thing that matters, no? I won't let anything get in my way to do so.
slogan: A strong-willed lady with blossoming strength!
tail_fact: She wears a needle lace tail cover for bedtime.

ears_fact: They'd like to break her alarm clock.
family_fact: Her mother has clear skin, and her father is a brilliant blonde.
profile: Gold City. ...Just so you know, I won't forgive you if you treat me like a doll. Don't judge me by my looks, but by the way I run.
slogan: A blunt, but high-quality gal!
tail_fact: Unconsciously stays still when being photographed.

ears_fact: Loves to suddenly cover another person's ears and asking "Guess who?".
family_fact: They seem to be a national secret.
profile: Yo, I'm Gold Ship! I don't care if it's on the turf, on fire, or at the edge of the universe. I'm going to find something interesting wherever I can! ☆
slogan: Rude and unrestrained! An enigmatic golden denpa girl!
tail_fact: She sometimes leaves it in her room (according to her).

ears_fact: マッサージされると爆速で眠くなる
profile: Gran Alegria here! From 0.75 miles to 1.25 miles nothing can stop this here future Queen of Mile!
slogan: With a s-mile, anything is possible! The strongest Mile Umamusume.
strengths: 運動全般、ソフトクリームを綺麗に巻くこと
tail_fact: 眠る前は赤いリボンで毛先までまとめる

ears_fact: They don't move an inch when she's making tea.
family_fact: "My parents influenced my love for Japan. They have a Japanese-style room in their house."
profile: My name is Grass Wonder. Since I was born as a Umamusume, I want to pursue this path to the end. Hehe ♪
slogan: Neat and pretty. The ideal Japanese woman from America.
strengths: Japanese sweets, Japanese culture in general, competitive karuta.
tail_fact: Able to swat bugs without looking behind her.

ears_fact: Hard words go in the right and come out the left.
family_fact: Her favorite dish is her mother's carrot rice.
profile: I'm Haru Urara! I love carrots and I lo~ve running because it's fun!♪ I'm going to try my very best to finish first!
slogan: She has lots of losses, but won't lose hope! The girl who never gives up!
tail_fact: She thought spinning it would make her go faster.

ears_fact: They always catch the slightest sound of hunger.
family_fact: Her father is a master chef, and her mother is a baking teacher.
profile: I'm Hishi Akebono ♪ I'll put lo~ts of love into both cooking and running for everybody! It's nice to meet you!~
slogan: Large! Great! Big... plate? Bono appétit ♪
tail_fact: It swishes around a lot while she's whisking.

ears_fact: Very sensitive to hearing the word "taiman".
family_fact: She's the youngest child, but has a mother's touch.
profile: There are a lot of good-lookin' people here... hehe. I'll take them all on. I'm Hishiama! Come on, let's get to it!
slogan: She's up for a fight! Our trusty Miss Matron.
tail_fact: Many students admire her shiny black hair.

ears_fact: It takes a while for them to stand up after waking up in the morning.
family_fact: Her parents sent in her application to the academy before she could.
profile: I'm Hishi Miracle. I'm doing my best while keeping the vibes good. I hope you'll do the same, okay?
slogan: A laid-back Umamusume. Today is business as usual.
strengths: Finding forest bathing spots, avoiding being called on in class
tail_fact: She's thought about dyeing it before.

ears_fact: Never forgets to wear her ear covers.
family_fact: Her allowance always includes some fine Tomakomai sweets.
profile: I'm Hokko Tarumae, I came here from a port town in the north like a paper crane. The Loco-dol of Tomakomai♪ ...Hmm, maybe I could come up with something more clever.
slogan: A realist local idol. Running for Tomakomai.
tail_fact: More active when in Locadol mode.
weaknesses: Praying for good fortune, boarding ships

ears_fact: The fur on both ears always matches exactly.
family_fact: She tends to lead family meetings.
profile: My name is Ikuno Dictus. If you are looking for management, leave it to me. I will manage you thoroughly with an iron will.
slogan: A thorough managing principle. A capable Umamusume who combines hot with cold.
tail_fact: She uses it to point at things.

ears_fact: When they hear the sound of festival music, they move as if they were performing a dance.
family_fact: Her family's rule is that the order of bathing is determined by playing Menko.
profile: The hell are ya sayin'?! I'm Inari One! As you can see, I'm an efficient child of Edo! I wanna become the biggest Umamusume of them all!
slogan: The hell are ya sayin'?! A self-proclaimed "Edo child" with lightning speed.
strengths: Target phooting, die cutting, goldfish scooping
tail_fact: Washing it with hot water even in the middle of summer is a chic obsession.

ears_fact: They tend to react to the sound of little children's voices.
family_fact: Her family rule is "Hold hands when going out."
profile: Hey hey~! I'm Ines Fujin! I'm going to race and work hard to make sure my family is happy!~
slogan: Full of energy! A hardworking family girl!
tail_fact: Used to being played with by her sisters, she's never surprised when it gets grabbed.
weight: Slight increase (A bit too much food?)

ears_fact: Birds sometimes land on them.
family_fact: She can't get over the fact that her older brother is popular with the girls.
profile: Jungle Pocket's the name. I'll be your partner, as long as you wanna run! But don't think you'll be taking my title of "the strongest"!
slogan: Dashing down the highway to become the strongest! A flaw- lessly charismatic delinquent.
strengths: Huddling, climbing trees, the first karaoke song
tail_fact: It flaps like crazy when she's near Fuji Kiseki.

ears_fact: They shake a little when she hears laughter.
family_fact: Her vocabulary increases slightly when she talks to her parents.
profile: ...I am K.S. Miracle. I will repay everyone who gave me this life... I will make miracles happen.
slogan: A miracle as a sign of gratitude. A kind and gentle Umamusume.
strengths: Guiding the way, transcribing music by ear
tail_fact: Has a soapy fragrance.

ears_fact: She puts on her ear covers last when changing clothes, and gets pumped up.
family_fact: Her parents say that she's aughty and a handful to this day.
profile: Nice to meetcha! I'm Katsuragi Ace. Don't be afraid to dream, okay? I'll break down any walls that stand in your way!
slogan: Aiming to become the ace! A lively girl dashing towards her great ambition.
tail_fact: She welcomes brushing at any time.

ears_fact: She's proud to admit that among all other Umamusume, her ears look the best with a tiara.
family_fact: They always picked out cute and durable clothes for her.
profile: Oh-ho-ho! I am Kawakami Princess... Yes, a princess above all princesses! I'll daintily knock you off of your feet at the races!
slogan: Aim to become a Princess! A magnificent tomboyish Umamusume.
tail_fact: She has a self-proclaimed "princess tail".

ears_fact: They don't want to hear anything other than topics adequate for the first-class.
family_fact: Her mother is catastrophically incapable of housework, so she has servants.
profile: Ohhh-ho-ho! My name is King Halo. As a first-class Umamusume, I'll give you the best results... And show the world this talent of mine!
slogan: A domineering young lady. Her pride is higher than the sky!
tail_fact: Her tail wagging is always top-notch.
weaknesses: Crowds, heat, etc. aren't appropriate for the King

ears_fact: She has an excellent sense of sound.
family_fact: A family of 30 people, including her father's disciples, live with her.
profile: I'm Kitasan Black! I'm going to run as fast as I can to make this race as exciting as a festival!
slogan: She lights up our hearts! A cheerful and lively festival girl!
tail_fact: Even her tail can hold heavy things.
weaknesses: Turning a blind eye to things

ears_fact: 配信ノイズは360度、聞き逃さない
slogan: ラヴミー♡ラヴユー♡\n愛あふれる配信者

profile: My name's Lucky Lilac, nice to meetcha. I'll overcome any and all trials to become the star of the turf.
slogan: The flower that survives the long winter will surely bloom magnificently.

ears_fact: Apparently, there is a voice that only she can hear.
family_fact: Her family loves coffee, so their beans are specially imported.
profile: ...I am Manhattan Cafe. I have a friend I want to catch up to... The girl who always runs in front of me... She's right there...
slogan: A mysterious girl chasing after a ghostly shadow.
tail_fact: She has naturally soft and silky hair.

ears_fact: Listening to Eurobeat makes her want to drive faster.
family_fact: She drives her father's second-hand red supercar.
profile: Hi, I'm Maruzensky! Did you come to see this new style of running too? Hehe ♪ Even though I'm crazy about it... I don't know how to feel ♪
slogan: Retro-Showa style Supercar Lady
tail_fact: She likes to shampoo her hair in the morning to make it smooth and silky.

ears_fact: They help her identify marvelous sounds☆
family_fact: She loves her grandma, and they go leaf peeping together in the fall.
profile: Hi hi~, I'm Marvelous Sunday! I'm bringing a Marvelous feeling to the whole world! Now, let's all be Marvelous together!
slogan: Marvelous! Vibrant, invincible, and changing the world!
strengths: Listening to many people at once
tail_fact: When she finds something marvelous, it goes up like an antenna☆

ears_fact: Will pay no attention to noisy environments.
family_fact: Whenever she goes home, her parents hang a banner at their restaurant.
profile: Yoo-hoo, I'm Matikanetannhauser. I've been practicing hard so I won't lose to anyon—Oh, today's my day off?!
slogan: A beloved but unpolished great talent. Today is her big day!
tail_fact: When she cuts it herself, it looks like diagonally cut bangs.

ears_fact: She will sometimes use them to point while fortune-telling.
family_fact: Like an excellent older sister, she admires her younger sister's cheerfulness.
profile: Hello! They call me Matikanefukukitaru! I believe in the divine messages of Shiraoki-sama, and I constantly am working on my fortune telling, waiting for the day I'll be blessed with good fortune!
slogan: Come, good fortune! A divination-loving happy-go-lucky girl.
tail_fact: Will suddenly stop moving during a fortune-telling session.
weight: Today's fortune was "Bad", so slight decrease

ears_fact: She doesn't listen to things that she doesn't want to hear.
family_fact: Her father was a pilot, so the airport was her playground.
profile: Ehehe, I'm Mayachin!☆ I love thrilling and exciting things~ Nice to meetcha!
slogan: A sweet little sister. She can't wait to grow up!
tail_fact: It swishes around a lot when she lies.

ears_fact: Frequently trembles in small increments.
family_fact: She is proficient in many languages due to her family's frequent relocation.
profile: I-I'm Me-Meisho Doto! U-uhm, uhm... I've been trying my best to become more confident in... m-mythelf- OWW!
slogan: She's trying to stay positive! A negative go-getter.
tail_fact: She has a habit of fiddling with it when distressed, so it gets tangled up a lot.

ears_fact: The sound of breaking glass makes her ears tilt downwards.
family_fact: My mother wants me to invite my friends from the academy over to our house.
profile: My name is Mejiro Ardan. I want to run proudly, even if these legs will be short-lived... Even if only for a moment, I would like to shine in a race.
slogan: Shine short and bright. The young lady with glass legs.
tail_fact: She loves to use a custom-made organic treatment.

ears_fact: Falls asleep easily while getting her ears cleaned.
family_fact: During homecoming season, her whole family comes to pick her up.
profile: ............Hmm? Is it time for me to introduce myself? Heheheh, my name is Mejiro Bright. I will try my best as a member of the Mejiro family~.
slogan: A strong will at a loose pace! Carefree lady.
tail_fact: She doesn't really notice it when it lays on her hips.
weaknesses: Eating ice cream before it melts
weight: Slight increase ("Oh dear, I ate too much～")

ears_fact: She freezes up when she hears men's voices.
family_fact: Her father is sad that he can no longer call her "Ber-chan".
profile: Hello... I'm Mejiro Dober. I'm a Umamusume of the Mejiro family, and I'm not ashamed to say that... I intend to do my best.
slogan: I want to change! A young lady running with scars from her past.
tail_fact: She prefers products that suit her hair type rather than brand name products.

ears_fact: They tend to stand alert when in front of others.
family_fact: Her parents call her "Mac-chan".
profile: My name is Mejiro McQueen. Conquering the "Spring Tennosho" has been a long-cherished goal of the Mejiro family, and I will do it with my own two legs.
slogan: Pride of the prestigious Mejiro family. Elegant, determined young lady.
tail_fact: Sways wildly when she's talking about sports.

ears_fact: They can sense wind direction and wind strength.
family_fact: Her father is a master golfer, but their scores have been reversed.
profile: I'm Mejiro Palmer! How ya doing~? Well, if you ever need anything, I'm always here. Feel free to talk to me ♪
slogan: Let's take it easy. A reliable and positive gal.
tail_fact: It sometimes tickles other people's legs to make them laugh.

ears_fact: When she gets a massage, she gets her ears massaged to the tips too.
family_fact: The wintersweet in their garden is a family favorite.
profile: You want to get to know me? Then come to the turf by all means. There you'll learn everything about me... Mejiro Ramonu.
slogan: Races with a love supreme… A devilish flower, blooming unrivaled at the top.
tail_fact: Is always in aerodynamic form.

ears_fact: They twitch around a lot when she's reading shoujo manga.
family_fact: Her father is very young and is often mistaken for her brother.
profile: My name is Mejiro Ryan! Train your body, stay healthy! Grow some muscle, stay fit! Let's go for it!
slogan: She feels fresh and sporty! Even her glistening sweat is pure.
tail_fact: She sweats a lot, so she always has a towel for her tail.

ears_fact: She wakes up instantly when commanded, even when in a deep sleep.
family_fact: Her family is living in an old-fashioned home because of the frequent breakage of household appliances.
profile: My name is Mihono Bourbon. My goal is locked onto becoming a Triple Crown Umamusume. Please refer to my data for legwork and other information.
slogan: Your orders will be strictly followed! Cyborg Umamusume.
tail_fact: Rumor has it that she has enough strength to stand on her own tail...

ears_fact: Can touch her ears with her feet.
family_fact: Her parents married half-eloping
profile: There's a breeze only racing can offer. It's light, clear, and..... an unrestrained tailwind. --I'm Mr. C.B.. Nice to meet you.
slogan: Bound by nothing! A cheerful and flawless Umamusume.
tail_fact: Frequently changes tail treatment products.
weaknesses: Lining up, lies and careless misrepresentations

ears_fact: She added the ear-holes to her beanie herself.
family_fact: All of her family members are poor sleepers.
profile: It's Nakayama Festa. Halfhearted races don't give me a thrill. Hey... Let me feel the intense heat of the race...!
slogan: All or nothing! An outlandish gambler who attacks at the last second.
strengths: Looking after plants and small animals
tail_fact: Uses her tail movements as a bluff when gambling.

ears_fact: Hearing the fanfare gets her fired up.
family_fact: Her parents and sister always say "taciturnity is a sign of kindness".
profile: ...I'm Narita Brian. I don't have a story to tell you. I just run, crush, and win.
slogan: She speaks with her back! A hard-headed, stubborn, lone wolf!
tail_fact: She rarely takes care of her tail.

ears_fact: They only turn towards topics that interest her.
family_fact: Rumor has it that the moms of BNW are friends now.
profile: Narita Taishin. That's all. I just want to win and shove it in the faces of the ones who made fun of me... Leave me alone.
slogan: Cool and dry! Even though she's small, she still wins.
tail_fact: Flicks when touched by anyone other than a trusted friend.

ears_fact: She's been an ear model before.
family_fact: She gets her angry eyes from her father.
profile: Hello, I'm Narita Top Road! I will do my best to live up to the expectations of all of the ones who support me!
slogan: Flawless honor student! But she likes the supporting role...?
strengths: Long passes in soccer, making vocabulary flash cards
tail_fact: She's worried about it getting frizzy in humidity.

ears_fact: Their parabolic shape is perfect for receiving "signals".
family_fact: She can understand about 54% of what her dad says.
profile: Neo Universe would like to propose a friendly "contact". In other words— "Nice to meet you".
slogan: A little strange? Or more than just a little? Umamusume with an outer space vibe.
strengths: Predicting the weather, falling block games
tail_fact: Becomes a Dust Tail when she's not feeling well.

ears_fact: They tend to react when she hears the word "nee-chan".
family_fact: Her parents' snack bar is decorated with articles about their daughter.
profile: Uh... I'm Nice Nature. I guess I don't really live up to the name of "Nice Nature", haha... Let's take it easy, shall we?
slogan: Expectations? No, thank you! A cynical girl.
strengths: Table tennis, searching for tasty snacks
tail_fact: She takes care of it in the middle of the night in secret.

ears_fact: They have a reputation for being healing and comforting when touched.
family_fact: Her most treasured item is a watering can given to her by her parents.
profile: Hello, my name is Nishino Flower. I want to become a nice, sisterly Umamusume so that everyone can rely on me...!
slogan: Blooming smile ♪ An attentive Umamusume.
tail_fact: It smells like the sun and the scent of flowers in each season.

ears_fact: 形に合わせた兜を発注している
profile: Nyahaha! No Reason's the name, and world domination is my game! Let's get this coup started!
slogan: She needs no reason to follow her dreams to world domination!
tail_fact: 炭酸シャンプーで洗うのが好き

ears_fact: Careful massages of her ears improve their circulation.
family_fact: She often chats with her older sister at family meet-ups.
profile: North Flight here! My outfits, make-up, accessories and above all, huge effort are what makes me shine! So please watch me!
slogan: Cultivating glitter! She's a shining fashionista.
tail_fact: She has plenty of hair styles for her tail.

ears_fact: Can pick out the voices of the people from her hometown in the cheering.
family_fact: Family vacations mean hot springs, and she is a regular at one of the hidden hot springs.
profile: I am Oguri Cap. I'm going to do my best to make everyone in my hometown happy. Please take care of me.
slogan: A simple and cool dreamer from the countryside.
tail_fact: She has a soft body, so every part of it must be maintained.

ears_fact: Her ear accessory is made by her father.
family_fact: She inherited her artistic sense from her parents.
profile: You'd better show your respect by kneeling before me, the great Orfevre, and respect my reign.
slogan: Reigns supreme in heaven or hell. A tyrant, ruler of the turf.
strengths: Everything the world has to offer, doing as she pleases
tail_fact: Meticulously cared for by her older sister.

ears_fact: They relax and droop down when she is being cuddled.
family_fact: They often go picnicking when they're together.
profile: I'm Rhein Kraft! To make dreams come true, to break open paths, to connect with the future. That's the kind of umamusume I want to be!
slogan: To the twinkling future! A dreaming umamusume, bright like the sun.
strengths: Making things by hand, rock climbing
tail_fact: It's always fluffy and soft.

ears_fact: They droop when she hears about other's unhappiness.
family_fact: She used to fall asleep listening to her parents read picture books.
profile: I'm... Rice Shower. Um... I'm a useless girl who makes others unhappy... but I'm trying my best to change!
slogan: Unhappy disposition? A sorrowful maiden who lives a praiseworthy life.
tail_fact: She pays attention not to bump it into people.

profile: I have but one goal: to be the Strongest! I want my name to go down in history, and to do that I'll paint myself in the best light!
slogan: Creating her legend! Aims to be the strongest, in her own peculiar ways.

ears_fact: She only hears half of what people are saying.
family_fact: Her family's motto is "Praise, praise, praise, and praise!".
profile: Hello! My name is Sakura Bakushin O! As you can see, I am a brilliant class representative! Let's set a great example for everyone! BAKUSHIIIN!
slogan: The great and reckless class president. She's always on the move!
tail_fact: When she's rushing, you can't even catch the tips of her tail.
weaknesses: Things that require more than 3 steps

ears_fact: When she thinks of a good proverb, her ears tingle.
family_fact: Dinner was often a potluck with her family.
profile: I'm S-Sakura Chiyono O! I will make my dream of standing on my ideal stage with the person of my dreams blossom!
slogan: Chase your dreams! An honest and hardworking girl!
tail_fact: Tended to with the same oil that Maruzensky uses.
weaknesses: Cars and airplanes (prone to motion sickness)

ears_fact: Stand up when hearing the sound of a horn.
family_fact: Her father passed down his recipe for omelettes and galettes to her.
profile: I'm Sakura Laurel. My goal is the world. The Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe! --Well, it's just a "dream" now, but... I'll make it come true someday for sure!
slogan: Calm and unyielding. A cherry blossom blooming beyond winter.
strengths: Eating salad as if it was wanko soba
tail_fact: The hair is very fluffy, just like her mom's.
weaknesses: The moment of take-off (otherwise fine on planes)

ears_fact: They tend to clench at crucial moments.
family_fact: They share their random thoughts through social media.
profile: I'm Satono Crown! I will bring pride to the Satono Group. I'll give it my all. I will find strength in adversity! Just you wait!
slogan: The turf's illusionist! A trustworthy elite older sister.
tail_fact: Treated with products from the Satono Group hotel chain.
weaknesses: The midsummer heat, unscheduled days off

ears_fact: Always have a translucent sheen.
family_fact: Her father is a distinguished man and a philanthropist in the Umamusume world.
profile: My name is Satono Diamond. My fate has never been decided from the beginning. I will make the future shine with my running!
slogan: Diamond-grade core! A young lady who defies jinxes!
tail_fact: It feels supreme (Kitasan Black's words).

ears_fact: Intuitively understands many languages by feel.
family_fact: Her whole family has matching sunglasses.
profile: Haa-ha-ha-ha! It's Seeking the Pearl! Guess what? The world is full of possibilities, and I'm gonna prove it to you!
slogan: Take on the world! The older sister who makes the world her oyster.
tail_fact: Learned calligraphy with her tail to perform internationally.

ears_fact: When they stand on edge, it's meaningful.
family_fact: When she goes home, she goes fishing with her grandfather and his fishing buddies.
profile: Yahoo-, it's Seiun Sky. Take your time and relax... When you're aiming for a big goal, it's important to take your time, right?
slogan: My pace, my life. Like a drifting cloud...
tail_fact: Naturally well-done without tending to it.
weaknesses: Small, cramped places (The gate, the gate!)

ears_fact: They ping back and forth when she thinks of a new prank.
family_fact: The whole family sang the commercial song for her dad's company.
profile: Roar~! It's Shinko Windy! You scared? You can tell me if you're scared~! ...Hey! Don't ignore me! Grrrrr!
slogan: She loves causing mischief! If you don't give her attention, she'll bite you!
strengths: Pranks, digging holes, climbing on roofs
tail_fact: Often has drool on it when she wakes up.

ears_fact: They tune out everything when she's thinking about running.
family_fact: They give her extra money for shoes.
profile: I'm Silence Suzuka. I like to run. I'm not giving the lead to anyone. Um... That's all.
slogan: The Silent Rider. Aiming to go beyond the speed of sound
tail_fact: She puts care into it to reduce air resistance.

ears_fact: Can't sleep without earplugs.
family_fact: Her father used to hire a different private tutor every day.
profile: Sirius Symboli! No need to talk about the race. Just shut up and watch. I'm going to conquer the world and prove that I'm the strongest.
slogan: World's brightest star to be! Charismatic Umamusu of ambition.
tail_fact: Tends to get all frizzy when she's frustrated.

ears_fact: They pick up on every single fan's voice.
family_fact: Her hair ornament is from the first idol costume that her mother made.
profile: I'm Smart Falcon! You can call me Falco! My dream is to become a Umadol! Autographs are always welcome ☆
slogan: She'll handle the fanservice! Future Top Umadol.
tail_fact: She pays attention to how she sits so that she doesn't get in the habit of sitting improperly.

ears_fact: Her covers are from an overseas brand that specializes in fabrics.
family_fact: They tend to chat through jam sessions.
profile: Behold, my lovely musciciste! Join me, Sounds of Earth, to create a wonderful melodia together!
slogan: The race is her ensemble! An artistic Umamusume with a love for music.
tail_fact: She uses different tail cologne when she's in uniform.

ears_fact: They pick up on any sound of cooking.
family_fact: Her eye color came from her birth mother.
profile: My name is Special Week! My dream is to be the best Umamusume in Japan! I'm gonna pull my own weight to make my moms proud!
slogan: Gonna do 'er best! A naive country girl beelining to her dream.
tail_fact: She's not very good at playing poker; her tail calls her bluff.

profile: My name is Still in Love. I... I'm not worthy of any more introduction... I like to... keep those things to myself...
slogan: Stuck between instinct and intuition. The craving bewitcher.

ears_fact: She's good at cleaning other's ears, but not getting her ears cleaned.
family_fact: Her family's day-care center has a reputation for making people feel at home.
profile: Tee-hee... I'm Super Creek~ I'll do my best to make everyone smile. Please leave it to me ♪
slogan: A gentle older sister who can heal you with her calm, motherly nature.
tail_fact: It's great at soothing small children.

ears_fact: Every word she doesn't know sounds like an incantation.
family_fact: Whenever she calls her father, he always cries before she hangs up.
profile: Sweep Tosho is my pre-transformation name! I am Sweepy the Magical Girl! Now this is sorcery! Aaah!! (Bonk)
slogan: A pure and troublesome child! She'll definitely be a witch!
strengths: Guessing the names of plants and flowers (sometimes made-up)
tail_fact: The black cat she tried to tame is treating it like a toy.

ears_fact: She stares at other Umamusume with ears that match hers.
family_fact: The whole family drinks their coffee black in the mornings.
profile: --I'm Symboli Kris S. I am indebted to the Symboli family. As one of them, I will carry out both the objectives I have set, and the "mission" I have been assigned.
slogan: Foreign-born, taciturn, missionary.
tail_fact: Scrubbed thoroughly with special shampoo.

ears_fact: Her ears prick up when she hears a good pun.
family_fact: Her parents taught her Imperialism from a young age.
profile: I am Symboli Rudolf. I am the one who will stand at the top of every Umamusume and lead them to become "Emperors". Those of you who share my aspirations, let's work together to conquer the world!
slogan: The reigning "Emperor", her authority is absolute!
tail_fact: When she's giving a speech, every strand of hair is powerful.

ears_fact: Every word sounds like praise to her.
family_fact: She respects her parents for raising her to be gorgeous.
profile: Haa-ha-ha-ha! I am the strongest and most beautiful of them all, the "Supreme King", T.M. Opera O! Now, let the legend begin!
slogan: Haughty king of the Opera. Her laugh is loud and proud!
tail_fact: It glistens in the light.

ears_fact: Whenever she hears about a party, she runs to it.
family_fact: My parents always welcome fireworks in the house.
profile: Howdy! I'm Taiki Shuttle! I'm here to make everyone happy with my powerful running!
slogan: American-born friendly girl.
tail_fact: She has her tail spray mailed to her.

ears_fact: When she hears the word "bargain" or "sale," her ears stand up straight.
family_fact: When she's with her brothers and sisters, she's called "Tama-nee".
profile: Ah'm Tamamo Cross! A'hm gonna win'n win'n win to make a name for myself! Don't underestimate me just 'cause ah'm small!
slogan: Just like a bolt of lightning on the attack.
tail_fact: Shakes like a lightning bolt when she's angry.

ears_fact: "Singing my praises is I—" (She ignored the question.)
family_fact: Their house's nameplate is made of a broken fence. (Made by her mother.)
profile: I am Tanino Gimlet! What I seek is the ideal "me". I have no intention of deceiving my temporary self. Destroy it, kick it down, and progress to the end!
slogan: Get drunk on this aesthetic! A peaky, aesthetic, destructive god.
strengths: Mythology, philosophy, pronouncing the letter 'v', DIY
tail_fact: "I destroy common sense—" (She wants to break a fence with her tail.)

ears_fact: They swivel in search of adventure.
family_fact: She boasts the flavor of her mother's baked marshmallow pie.
profile: Come, friends, and join me on a journey where excitement and dance awaits! Everyone who wants to dream, climb aboard this vessel  with me!
slogan: Capturing friends, dreams and money! An Umamusume who lives for her dream of great adventure.
tail_fact: Uses hair oil to make it stand out while dancing.

ears_fact: They always pay attention to what the Student Council President says.
family_fact: She cried after trying to not call her parents "mommy" and "daddy".
profile: Heya, I'm Tokai Teio! I'm going to be an undefeated Triple Crown Umamusume, so don't let me out of your sight!
slogan: Invincible and cute! An innocent, hoppin' girl.
tail_fact: Waves around excitedly when she gets attention.

ears_fact: In order to make them seem fashionable, she takes pictures with both ears folded down.
family_fact: Her parents always told her to eat her veggies first. That always made her the most upset.
profile: I'm Tosen Jordan. My dream is... actually, serious topics are NG~☆ Anyways, look at my nails! Aren't they cool?
slogan: The uncouth Jordan! A modern-day gal ☆
tail_fact: She always makes sure to check for split ends.

ears_fact: They easily pick up the latest rumors.
family_fact: She tries to avoid her parents on social media.
profile: Nice to meetcha, Tray-chan♪ Let's look for exciting, thrilling things together!
slogan: Seeking thrills! She's a data junkie, hunting for solutions.
strengths: Video editing, holding chopsticks, string figures
tail_fact: She tests the latest tail care products on herself.

ears_fact: They twitch happily when others ask her for help.
family_fact: They often send her fruits.
profile: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi! Aiming to become the "Triple Crown Umamusume" of my dreams! I'll give it my all... BLEH! I-I just swallowed a lot of blood! I'm fine, I'm alright!
slogan: Dreams of the triple crown!! Always full power!! Liable to break her limits!?
tail_fact: If she doesn't dry it quickly after washing, she'll catch a cold.
weaknesses: The smell of compresses, low air pressure, being sick in bed

ears_fact: Twitch ever more happily the more she's ran down.
family_fact: Her parents found their frail daughter's recklessness to be an indication of growth.
profile: Twin Turbo! I'll take the first Turbo, I'll take it for sure! Let's go, Turbo, full throttle!!!
slogan: Turbo full throttle! An explosive Umamusume who knows no limits!
tail_fact: Wags all over the place, never staying still.

ears_fact: 捕球音だけで家族の誰が投げた球かわかる
profile: I am Verxina. I won't give up until I break down everything in my path to become a queen.
slogan: Deserving of the queen's throne. A celebrity Umamusume with unyielding spirit.

ears_fact: When pleading, she flaps them unconsciously.
family_fact: Their father's hamburg steaks are a staple at family gatherings.
profile: I'm Vivlos! One day I'll be a celebrity, racing in sparklign Dubai!♪ And you're coming with me, no ifs or buts!♪
slogan: Talented at getting pampered. Dreams of crossing the big wide ocean.
strengths: Cold weather, baseball, dreaming of being a celebrity
tail_fact: She uses conditioner from a brand for celebrities.

ears_fact: She gets really shy when someone touches them.
family_fact: Her and her dad are very mischievous together, they get scolded by her mom a lot.
profile: Yo, I'm Vodka! My goal is to be the coolest Umamusume in the world! I'm not gonna do anything stupid. Remember that!
slogan: Runaway youth! A pure-hearted, delinquent roadster
strengths: Acting like she's riding a motorcycle
tail_fact: She practices shaking it to look cool.

ears_fact: They respond to classical music.
family_fact: Her mother taught her nail care.
profile: I'm Win Variation. My only goal is to become the leader... the Principal! No matter how tough my opponents may be, I refuse to give up!
slogan: A strong willed Umamusume who never gives up, no matter how many times she loses!
tail_fact: She doesn't hate having it be touched, but it makes her feel a little uneasy.

ears_fact: According to her best friend, "Even her ear movement is annoying".
family_fact: Watching the Derby together is the most important family event of all.
profile: My... My... My dream is to be a Derby Umamusume! And then there's... ah! My name!!!! My name is Winning Ticket! Nice to meet you!
slogan: Laugh and cry to your heart's content! An honest girl who's true to her feelings.
strengths: Full of support, full of emotion
tail_fact: Expressions of joy, anger, grief, and pleasure are always visible.

ears_fact: Always respond to the sound of a gong.
family_fact: Her mother is the most relaxed person in her family.
profile: I'm Wonder Acute. I'm a slow learner, but I'm a hard worker. Please take care of me.
slogan: Relaxed, calm, and patient. A spirited Umamusume who never gives up.
strengths: Bead crafts, decorative cutting of daikon
tail_fact: Elegantly slips away from any touching attempts

ears_fact: She blushes a little when she hears a pretty voice.
family_fact: Whenever she returns home, she always pats her grandfather on the shoulder.
profile: I'm Yaeno Muteki. As a disciple of the Kongo Yaegaki way, I desire to race with the strong. Come on, let's fight like crazy!!
slogan: Charge, with might and decorum. A rugged Umamusume.
tail_fact: It's strong enough to knock down flying objects.

ears_fact: They're a resting place for butterflies and small birds.
family_fact: Her home is famous in her hometown for being a fancy house where fairies live.
profile: ......My name is Yamanin Zephyr. My goal is to be the wind... I want to be like the wind that runs faster and freer than anything else!
slogan: A naturally breezy Umamusume. Even so, her soul is like a gale.
strengths: Tonguing (wind instruments), flying kites, song & dance improv
tail_fact: She lets it dry naturally.

ears_fact: Owns many adorable earmuffs.
family_fact: Reliefed their daughter retains her dialect after going to the city
profile: Oh, my name is Yukino Bijin! My dream is to become a stylish city gal in the Twankle Series! Phew... I hope I said that right...
slogan: Aiming to be a City Girl! A hardworking girl from a rural area.
tail_fact: Currently trying out low-price care products.

ears_fact: When the story reaches its climax, they flicks and turn all over the place.
family_fact: Her parents can talk about the latest household appliances until the sun goes down.
profile: My name is Zenno Rob Roy. Well... this is me, but I'm longing for a heroic tale... I would like to tell my story within a race someday...!
slogan: One day, she'll have a heroic tale. An imaginative reader.
tail_fact: In crowds, she gets nervous and doesn't move it an inch.

profile: Hello, I am Aoi Kiryuin. I'm a new trainer at Tracen Academy. I'm still a novice, but I'll do my best for the sake of the Umamusume!
slogan: Direct and boundless! A motivated trainer.

profile: My name's Byerley Turk. What Umamusume need the most is strength. I'll train you to be strong enough to leave your mark on the earth.
slogan: A deep love for Umamusume hides behind her military strictness.

profile: I'm Darley Arabian. Each Umamusume has her own personality, and each one is the main character— Let's raise them with care, my little lamb!
slogan: Wise and honest. A leader who values individuality.

profile: My name is Godolphin Barb. What drives Umamusume forward are the bonds they have with others. I'll be there to help you out too.
slogan: An elegant teacher who wraps her students in kindness.

profile: Hi there! I'm Haiseiko! Give this predecessor, this "cutesy monster" a little taste of your heart~! *Chomp♪*
slogan: A national star☆ An idol gathering massive attention♪
The Gentle Umamusume. Happiness is a big deal.

profile: I, Light Hello, am mainly in the business of event planning. I will help all of you shine on stage... Please allow me to help you out a bit.
slogan: Connecting hearts on the stage where everyone sparkles, event producer!

profile: I'm Mei Satake! If you're looking for European race course analyses, I'm the gal to ask. Together, we'll make the dream of winning the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe come true!
slogan: A leader who continues to challenge the world and pursue her dreams.

profile: My name is Riko Kashimoto. It is the trainer's duty to take care of a Umamusume's health. It is only natural that we should work with a sense of responsibility.
slogan: A strict but gentle worker from the URA.

profile: My name is Ryoka Tsurugi. I spend my days producing all sorts of content. I strive to deliver the world's most engaging videos.
slogan: A talented producer aiming for the peak of entertainment.

profile: I am Saint Light. As the first Umamusume to receive the Three Garlands, I shall entrust you with my knowledge and blessing.
slogan: Through perseverance she became the first Triple Crown Umamusume.

profile: I'm Sasami Anshizawa, a skilled acupuncturist (disciple). I'm the one who can give you a boost and power you up! Wow, Anshi~n☆
slogan: Stabby passion? Ultra Genius? Acupuncturist.

profile: I'm Speed Symboli. I happen to know the endless possibilities that hide within you. Come, and we'll turn the world upside-down!
slogan: A legendary pioneer, laying the road to the rest of the world.

profile: Hello, I am Tazuna Hayakawa, secretary to the president of Tracen Academy. I will continue to support you so that you can have a better school life.
slogan: Secretary to the Tracen Academy President with a beautiful smile.
